Reviews.Title: “Great inexpensive room”
Reviews.Author: voyage_a_varadero
Reviews.Content: booked third party site saved checking upgrade queen king sofa table bathroom ok clean smelled fresh quiet corner quiet corner happy service directly infront largest shopping mall montreal subway station opposite street

Reviews.Title: “I wanted my money back.”
Reviews.Author: Jennifer M
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel eve december 31 2011 reason stay live downtown montreal spend night quieter excitement rated stay low buzzing coming electric station directly hotel located loud didnt sleep wink wearing earplugs yes loud fair sensitive hearing watching tv volume setting hear noise complained receptionist told couldnt hear kidding offered move unfortunately none free hotel tossed night calling checking 530am ears actually aching couldnt leave fast hotel nice aspects hotel practically door metro super convenient free parking free wireless internet perks stay street hotel avoid buzzing youll bring own fan white noise winter ac unit includes fan

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, for the price.”
Reviews.Author: brittany f
Reviews.Content: boyfriend hotel stayed friday december sunday january 1 2012 hotel located 15 minute drive downtown arrived 4pm tired decided eat near hotel shopping directly street sports bar le cage aux sport excellent food mall attached bar huge seeing boxing day passed found lots deals saturday evening ate dinner restaurant lobby surprisingly food eaten throughout entire trip standard arent fancy comfortable amount time actually spent unsure getting downtown left parking lot hotel follow street sherbrooke university street underground parking 2 minute walk entrance underground city largest underground shopping center

Reviews.Title: “Very bad; indifferent unprofessional stuff.”
Reviews.Author: Elena_And
Reviews.Content: paint falls sewage stinking stuff didnt beyond located didnt map montreal hotel wouldnt map city tourists didnt lobby waitresses restaurant didnt instructions coupons didnt provide service worst dealt noise complaint unlucky booked stay time bunch american teenagers thats issue nature loud night little security couldnt help told children care makes noise nights couldnt sleep checking people complaining noise beware normal people night animals wild crowds hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great location - good stay”
Reviews.Author: SilverDartLodgeWes
Reviews.Content: easy highway location walking distance mall restaurants service okay language barrier clean updated comfortable furnishings ate restaurant breakfast average close biodome montreal little ones overall recommend location cleanliness comfort

Reviews.Title: “perfectly fine, polite staff,clean room..............Val Caron On.”

Reviews.Content: location greatthe clean continental breakfast expected matter hope available plan stay depend expectation comfort inn

Reviews.Title: “Not to Shabby”
Reviews.Author: schmidta31
Reviews.Content: stay definitely walk lobby nice carpet didnt walking shoes pool nice chilly actually swim breakfast cold cereals dry pastries 2 toasters toast wait front desk staff excellent call pizza unsure wheather pizza employees spoke english wasnt stayed recommend friends
